metadata.description: The Daily Bugle has never been a friend of the super heroes of NYC, but with profits down and the newspaper's survival on the line, J. Jonah Jameson turns the heat up a notch! Meet the Bugle’s new team of super hero investigative journalists ; Jessica Jones, Kat Farrell & Ben Urich, as they dig up the dirt on the city’s most famous heroes- no matter the cost or who gets hurt!
metadata.name: Pulse
